CHAT.comment: Freeplay. Mother and Child sit on floor playing with box of. experimenter provided toys. They play briefly with tea set , play+ground set , puppets , and truck with shapes. Child is fairly intelligible.

u.a: picks up most of tea set .
holds up piece of merry+go+round and starts to assemble .
has finished emptying tea set box .
simultaneous; Mother takes bag from Child .
gives Cookie Monster to Child and puts on Ernie .
tries to figure out how to open truck .
still trying; shapes rolling inside making lots_of noise .
fumbles with red and green shapes .
drops green and picks up red and starts to insert .
